text: A good reminder  / overview on color accessibility: <http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2014/10/22/color-contrast-tips-and-tools-for-accessibility/>

attachments.title: Design Accessibly, See Differently: Color Contrast Tips And Tools - Smashing Magazine
attachments.text: Cathy O'Connor shares one aspect of design accessibility: making sure that the look and feel are sufficiently inclusive of differently sighted users.
attachments.fallback: Smashing Magazine: Design Accessibly, See Differently: Color Contrast Tips And Tools - Smashing Magazine
